#summary This page guides on how the Services Offered Web Part works!

= Components =

The following components are part of the Services Offered Web Part which is used by the organization to show the end user about the services offered by them.

== *The actual Web Part* ==
    * This is a *Visual web part* having a user control which comprises fields to capture the user data.
    * *Services List* of type Picture Librry is created for the images to be shpwn in the webpart with the use of Jquery.
    * *Title and Description*, column of the Services List is used tp show the Title and Description in the webpart.
